mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, pic_url picUrl, created_time createdTime FROM `group` ORDER BY rand() LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT id, uid, gid, title, content, pic_url picUrl, created_time createdTime FROM article ORDER BY rand() LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT art.id aid, uid, gid, tag_id, IFNULL(comment_count,0) comment_count, IFNULL(like_count,0) like_count FROM (SELECT id, gid, uid author_id FROM article) art LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, COUNT(id) comment_count FROM article_comment WHERE created_time>=DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 DAY) GROUP BY id) acc ON art.id=acc.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, COUNT(id) like_count FROM article_like WHERE created_time>=DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 DAY) GROUP BY id) alc ON art.id=alc.id INNER JOIN `group` g ON art.gid=g.id GROUP BY aid ORDER BY (IFNULL(comment_count,0)*5+IFNULL(like_count,0)) DESC LIMIT 500
